content.detailedDescription:
Out looking at the night sky - was it clear to see moon. 
surveyed the sky, look directly up slightly se. 
2 white triangle shapes appeared to lead the way. 
2 round colored glowing balls were following and "playing" - best word - by circling around each other, flashing. going from 1 form to 2. 
traveling steady ne fast speed but slow enough to see detail. 
much larger than the stars. 
when i saw them they seemed to be coming from the sw and heading directly ne out over the atlantic ocean. 

when i first noticed it i thought they were real and perfectly in control, round and moving fast. i knew it was something i've never seen before. thought about the military then. could apply to the lead ufo's, but the latter 2 were fun.  

my feelings were of excitement and happiness. i kept asking them to come back.  i lost sight when they hit tall trees in my neighborhood. i knew their direction was direct ne. 

no photos. i was mesmerized.  

i hope someone else in palm beach county, florida,  (boca, delray, boynton) from federal highway to ocean front a1a, saw them. 

thank you for having this site and form.
content.summary: 2 lead white lights guiding. short distance behind 2 round balls 1/red-orange, 1 copper

content.detailedDescription: Outside with my wife. she noticed the first orb. moving from south to north. almost double the rate of speed than the airline jets flying around. lost sight over tree line. about 2 minutes after observed the second orb moving from north to southwest. lost sight after looking away for a brief moment. 3rd orb appeared from west to northeast. appeared for about 8 seconds and then faded away. these events are taking place at about 9:45 p.M.
content.summary: 3 orbs, multiple directions, 3rd orb faded away

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside at 9:40pm smoking a cigarette when suddenly we watched what at first we thought was a shooting star. it flew over with a bright white light and a comet looking tail traveling faster than any shooting star or plain we have ever seen! if we had not seen it with our own two eyes we would not have believed it ourselves!!!  it went down wards over the fort gordon base never slowing down! i then though oh no is that a missile! called the cops to report what i had seen and the news to see if they had heard anything! i waited for a sound nothing. waited for a large boom and nothing! i have no ideal what it was or what it could be but to see it come out of the east flying just above the trees maybe 20 feet above them and to watch it go down but never hearing a crash or anything! this is not the first time my husband and i have witnessed odd happenings in the sky here! but this is the first time that i was ever scared that was a missile or something that was dangerous! we have made several reports of sightings that happen around this time of year starting in february and ending around august! someone needs to find out what this was!!!
content.summary: Bright shooting star looking light bright white with tail like a comet

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i own about fifty acres of land along a creek. most of it is wooded. about a quarter of a mile back from my house up by the road. we have a pig pen with three small pigs. my wife decided to put a game camera up to watch the pigs. there is a roadway we put in that takes you to the pig pen and a lot further back. one day she checked the camera chip and found strange lights beaming down or up - question. i put the picture on my lap top. i can pick out seven to eight lights on a angle from the north. only one picture was snapped of big and small lights around the pigs house. i have no clue of what made these lights. the picture was taken on 04/15/2014 at 10:55 pm. the night of the blood moon. the moon as far as i know was not north west of camera i did some research and came up with nothing to help me find the source. we will keep camera set up and  maybe put more up.  we have a cabin and house trailer further back to the west. we spend a great deal of time out there night and day. i want to stay out there at night but the picture has me abet rattled. and if i do i will be somewhat on edge. but i will be armed with light, camera and protection. if you can shed some light on this or need more info please let me know.
content.summary: I have a picture from a game camera by front of pig house showing strange lights

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i own about fifty acres of land along a creek. most of it is wooded. about a quarter of a mile back from my house up by the road. we have a pig pen with three small pigs. my wife decided to put a game camera up to watch the pigs. there is a roadway we put in that takes you to the pig pen and a lot further back. one day she checked the camera chip and found strange lights beaming down or up - question. i put the picture on my lap top. i can pick out seven to eight lights on a angle from the north. only one picture was snapped of big and small lights around the pigs house. i have no clue of what made these lights. the picture was taken on 04/15/2014 at 10:55 pm. the night of the blood moon. the moon as far as i know was not north west of camera i did some research and came up with nothing to help me find the source. we will keep camera set up and  maybe put more up.  we have a cabin and house trailer further back to the west. we spend a great deal of time out there night and day. i want to stay out there at night but the picture has me abet rattled. and if i do i will be somewhat on edge. but i will be armed with light, camera and protection. if you can shed some light on this or need more info please let me know.
content.summary: I have a picture from a game camera by front of pig house showing strange lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 12 years old and my friend john murchison lived down the block. we were all playing in his yard that afternoon,(don't remember if school was out yet, that is why i put april) we were playing freeze tag amongst other games. evidently they (the ufo)were either watching us from a distance for a while or just came out of nowhere.
all of a sudden we all heard a humming noise, stopped playing , looked up and right above the tree was the ufo , it was a saucer with what appeared to be  a section below with windows and i could clearly see humanoid figures watching us play. 
perhaps they were intrigued by the freeze tag game or they were just watching us have fun... i don't know.
in a matter of seconds after we saw the craft we all screamed and ran inside to find john's mother mary saying the rosary and watching the ufo.
as soon as we went inside and looked out it was gone.

to this day i have been obsessed with ufo's and wish to see them again.
content.summary: My friends and i were playing freeze tag in my neighbors back yard when out of nowhere the ufo appeared above the tree in the yard.

content.detailedDescription: It was mother's day and me and my girlfriend were sitting out on the rear deck of our home.  i was staring up at the sky watching an airplane fly by.  then while watching the airplane i suddenly saw an oval shaped object appear in the sky.  i watched it and noticed it was moving in a straight line from east to northeast.  it just appeared out of no where and stayed in the sky approximately 8-10 seconds and disappeared.  i immediately yelled to my girlfriend "did you see that?" she stated, "no."  i got up from my deck chair and moved towards the northeast corner of my rear deck and told my girlfriend to join me.  she got up and came to my location and we watched the sky in hope to see the object again.  we stood there approximately 60 seconds and watched the sky.  all of a sudden the object re-appeared and we both saw it.  it did the same as before and still appeared to be traveling northeast in the sky but further ahead of the last location i saw it.  this time the when the object appeared it stayed visible for about 10 seconds and then disappeared. we observed the sky for another 10 minutes or so and the object never re-appeared.  the object was shaped like an oval and it appeared to be solid and then transparent like.  i want to add that the sky was free from clouds and it was still daylight.  when i first saw the commercial airplane travelling from northwest to southeast the plane never faded or disappeared from sight.  me and my girlfriend stood there and was silent as we tried to figure out what we observed.  the experience gave me chill bumps.  really bizarre.
content.summary: Object appeared out of no where and disappeared.  reappeared about 30 secs later and disappeared again.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to check the weather so i could head out to my friend's house for the night. as i went outside, i saw the ufo flying overhead about 70-80 feet above the ground coming from the southwest. it hovered over the field of my apartment complex for a moment. it was solid black but it was low enough that craft outline could be determined as a triangle. when it hovered i was intrigued by the lack of sound in the area. i then noticed a small white light appear on the base of the craft and a large illuminated area of the apartment building adjacent to mine appeared on it's roof and traveled down the wall side. hit the common area of grass. and began to scan the ground. only when it head my direction did i head back to my apartment and hide. it flew off towards north west. i know this because i went back outside about 10 minutes later to see it again over some houses with it's light. it stayed there about 5  minutes and traveled a very acute angled south east.
content.summary: It flew overhead, stopped, shot a visable to the ground and flew off.

content.detailedDescription: this happened about 3 or 4 years ago its still in my head clear as day and still freaks me out i don't remember the day but i went out front to have a smoke around 10- 10:30 pm i was out front but on the drive strip we have a car parked on i went to the car lit my cigarette i walked to the back of the car and was like 5 feet from the sidewalk i was looking towards the east and south east and a woman has a huge pine tree like 4 houses down and across the street and i was a the back of the car i started to see a amber reddish orange light then i saw 2 they were coming from the south east and like they were climbing up the tree but as they got closer i can see they were as high as the tree top they were further away when i first saw them so i walked to the front of the car i saw 4 amber reddish orange lights you know how planes or jets fly in a arrow formation like 2 close together in the front and 2 further apart in the back well they were backwards 2 orbs were far apart and 2 behind those close together i saw them come over the big tree right towards me i was at the front of the car getting scared and the closer they came the more i got more scared so i ran in the side yard where we have a 10x20 cover over another car i i was still watching but i was out from the cover just enough to still see them so i was stupid i flashed my flashlight at them then they stopped still in formation so i ran in the house and upstairs and woke my mother and brother up we went to he loft window and the orbs broke formation and went north but stopped over the woman's house next door and a little higher up we all were scared they were in different spots but close to each other then one went up higher and flickered out then a lower one did he same thing we watched them for 15 min out the loft window the 2 came back on and went south east so we ran to my mothers window which looks south and one was moving fast and the one that followed was slower the faster one was like over a trail that goes to a creek it stopped and the slower one wen near it and started to go east then stop more where the creek is we saw both drop sparks and looked like molten metal then the one closer to us it looked like it dropped a pod it was shaped like a grain of rice it was coming down real slow the one further away dropped a pod but it went down like i would say 5 feet from it then stopped and wen horizontally to the other pod then went down together then the orbs took off we went to see the other 2 but they were climbing high but still over the house next door and over my house it lasted around a half hour from he time i firs saw them behind the big tree to he time they dropped the pods and then took off these things scare the hell out of my mother and brother i felt so scared but the first time since i been seeing these orbs i been told im crazy and need help by many people and what friends i have stopped talking to me even though they did see the orbs when they were here on other sightings and i dont know why they keep coming in my area me and my brother sit outside at night to look for the orbs we have seen them during the day but no light on they and silver matalic my brother seen 3 hovering over walmart it was a saturday like 8 or 9 am but pretty much everywhere we go in town we see some type of ufo i try to take pics but my camera stops working and cell goes out when hey are around i got a call from a guy at mufon but the message was scrambled i culdnt hear his name of his whole number call me any time i have many more sightings i remember clear as day but this one haunts me daley cant get it out of my mind
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I went outside to have a smoke and saw 4 redish orange orbs coming towards me it was the first stghting that scared me i seen many others but this one was different

content.detailedDescription:
While in the backyard star gazing, satellite watching, my attention was drawn to a part of the night sky by what seemed like a very bright.. brighter than normal flash.  

i turned and watched in the direction i thought it came from.  after what seemed like a while, i saw it again but more straight on. 

i waited to see if it would do it again, another flash to my right occurred. at first i thought to myself "its moving!" but then about 10 seconds later, the initial one flashed again, far to the left, had to be 1 mile apart from each other.

i called for my wife to come out.   she came out and i pointed and said wait, just watch.   a few seconds later, flash! she said "what's that?"  i said, now wait, watch over there now. 10 seconds or so.. flash! 

back over to the original spot  11 seconds.. flash!!

very bright, lots of time in between and 2 spots in the sky, far apart. to me looks like they could be signalling each other but i'm sure that doesn't make sense as they'd certainly be able to communicate beyond flashing lights, so maybe it was both ends of 1 ship?

whatever it was, it just stopped flashing after about 10 minutes of back and forth very bright flashes.
content.summary: 2 lights very far apart, alternating bright flashes, about 11 seconds apart
2 triangle, 3 bright light

content.detailedDescription:
traveling to my cabin with my mother, driving on m28 in the seeney wildlife preserve heading west. u.P michigan. it was dark around 1130 at night. traveling 60 mph. when a gold orb around 2 foot in diameter, came from behind our car. flew over us about 3 feet above the car .
      i could have touched it if i was sitting on top of car. and came down in front of us in the headlights at road level. the orb was traveling faster than the car and after it cam into view it went down the road about 20 yards and turned into the woods, flying into the trees under the tree line. 
      the center of the orb was a brighter yellow light at the core, so the actual object seemed to be only about a foot wide and the gold aura around it was another foot....
      the  orb left a light trail like a long exposure photo , but the light trail was made up of hundreds of rings of light not a long stream. , they looked like golden hair in a perfect ring and the rings  dissipated as the orb went into the woods. as we drove by the spot where the orb entered the woods there were still rings hovering in the air where the orb had gone into the dense cedar swamp 
    .  we were driving through these small rings of light  and could see them in perfect detail. both my mother and i were sober and have never seen anything like this in our lives. the rings of light were the most beautiful thing i have ever seen. the orb made no sound and the entire sighting only lasted about 5 to 10 seconds.
content.summary: Small golden orb flew over my car from behing, . the orb went infront of vwhical at road level. changed direction and went into the woods, under treeline, made no sound and left a very interesting light trail behind it made up of rings of light

content.detailedDescription: I was 5 yrs old at the time. watching alien nation with my family eating cereal for desert. the alien's in the movie grossed me out, so about 15-20 min. in i got too grossed out and went out side to finish eating. it was around 9-10 o'clock at night, very quit, no one was out side and no car's driving around. i walked around the front yard bored then looked up to see the sky and noticed this "hamburger" looking thing over the house across the street (a side ways oval shape with a row of square light's in the middle probably wraping all aroud it). i really didn't think eany thing of it and walked around some more. i  found a cat walking around and picked it up to play with it and showed the cat the object. that's when i reallised i was looking at an alien ship. i put the cat down and staird at it for a few minutes, it was 3-4 ft. above the house and probably 30 ft. away. it one light that would brighten up the ones around it as it would rotate around the ship and made no sound or movement the hole time. after a few minutes i ran inside and told my parents, brother, and sister's to come see the space ship outside, they told me they where coming so i went back outside to see if it was still there. the ship never moved. i stude in the drive way just looking at it for a few more minutes, when no one came out i went back in to tell them again to come see the space ship and again they said they where coming to see, so i ran back outside. luckily the ship was still there when i went back out. threw the holl time the ship did not move at all, just the one light going round and around. after a few more minutes still no one came out. so i went back in the house for a third time and again my parents said they where on there way out to see, so i went back outside but this time there was no space ship. it was gone and i was the only one who new it was there.
content.summary: Object above house across the street from mine at that time. it vanished after third attemped to get more witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
5/13/2014  0335-0349

i am a night security guard at a construction company yard.It is a very large yard so i use binoculars to aid me in my patrol of the site.Which are every 30 minutes or on the hour as needed. on the morning of may 13,2014 at 0335 am under clear sky, almost a full moon, so the stars were dim  i noticed a bright star what i thought was venus or mars which ever is the morning star at this time but i realized that it was in the wrong place.It was at a south west direction.As i watched it it appeared to be moving slowly or possibly hovering it was quite a distance away i got my binoculars to see what it was but the light was hard to focus on. my binoculars are 8x25.As it drifted and changing angle coming north east,in the direction of the big dipper it began to move faster i could see two lights side by side about a fist width apart. as it continued going north and even with me i saw that it had three lights in the shape of a triangle and a red glow in the center underneath,the lights on this object did not blink.I did also notice a airplane (because of the blinking lights)in the sky going south at the same time but more to the west of my location.The total time of the experience lasted about 14 minutes.There are two very tall oil rigs on the site when it moved out of my view behind the rigs i was unable to locate the object again.
content.summary: I saw a bright star inthe south looked like drifting. thenmoved faster as it got closer i could see that it had three lights in the shape of a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Noticed ufo in pictures,while photographing "contrails" cover whole sky. i showed a friend the photo, when he commentated on it, i noticed the disk shaped object in picture. real strange, just thought i should share. thanks a bunch for time, i hope you guys figure it out. 
    p.S. 
   actual ufo pic is file 2, file 1 contains the picture i took seconds before.
content.summary: Noticed ufo in pictures,while photographing "contrails" cover whole sky

content.detailedDescription:
Ok i will upload the clip of what the camera caught.   i want to say a few things about it before i do.


to start with i'm in alaska and this was captured on a very cold night 18 degrees with snow on the ground.

i probably need to draw you a picture of the layout of my house, but i'll try to convey it here.

there is a 40 foot motor home in the front and i think you can see it in the clip.  this house is on a lake and

there is no where for anyone to go except the local people that live back here as the road dead ends here.


so reflection from lights is not possible.  the electric company has a work yard across the street from my house, but you 

can not see it when my motor home was parked here.  the cameras were put in by adt and are fixed and can not move.


you can see one bright object that comes from around the corner of my house and heads straight towards the camera and 

then just goes down what looks like the street but you can't see much after it goes by.    but, i slowed down the clip and

discovered that there were many orbs that night going straight back and forth across the yard and driveway and they were

of various sizes and density.   first thing is to have an open mind as i had to when looking at this clip.   the clip has not been 

modified in any way shape or form.  it's as real as it gets and it kind of scared me but i still live here today.


another strange thing that happens in the winter, especially this past winter here is that there was a ground vibration here

that only happened at night.  you could just feel it on the couch but really could feel it in bed.  this was very strange as this

house sits on a concrete slab foundation.   i also had a strange thing happen to me here in alaska when i was a child.  i'm 65 now.

it was before the earth quake of 1964 here.  i was fishing on the russian river here and saw a strange round object in the

clouds but never told anyone.  also what i saw as a big orange brown spear i will submit this clip to start with on the site as i also joined your site.


btw:  all the orbs you see will be moving in a straight line without any deviation as far as i could tell in course.  please have

someone that knows what they are doing look at this clip as i'm sure something strange is going on here.


thanks for your time and i'm glad that you have this thing going.


i will upload  that clip tonight as it's on a different computer than this one. 


[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Bright light and orbs as seen on video clip ( provided

content.detailedDescription: I was in our complexes pool and this object followed a plane and stopped then decended.  i was alone so i grabbed my phone to film. it had green, red, yellow, and orange lights. most prominent were green and red. it slowly seemed to fall and disappeared with a flash from behind the buildings it dropped behind.
content.summary: I was in our complexes pool and this object followed a plane and stopped then decended.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a music event at 11 pm last night. in the bathroom of the event i saw a strange news article from the 70s on the toilet paper container about time scanning. the event was a "noise"
show. that night i could have sworn it became thursday at midnight. and when i woke up the next day i could have sworn that it was thursday. i went into work and i realized that it was just wednesday. i went over to a friends house. throughout the day i found myself in the strangest feeling. it felt like time was moving very quickly and slowly at the same time and it make it difficult for me to do anything. later this evening, i felt drawn to go out on the porch to enjoy the rainfall. i sat in a chair. i noticed strange lights in the sky coming in my direction. i got up to try and get a better look and i couldn't make out a shape. then the lights began coming very quickly and lowering in my direction. it took a plane like shape at that point and began making the sounds of a plane. then it slowed down almost to a stop and changed direction and quickly got out of my eyesight. then a couple of minutes later in the distance in the sky i noticed what looked like lightening. and then i noticed another strange lighting in the sky that looked like lightening. then i heard strange loud noises and beeps. then in the płace of that light the sky flashed strange colors of purple blue and green. then it all stopped. i felt very scared but interested while this was happening. i couldn't move. then everything stopped and felt peaceful again. throughout the day i had been feeling blurred in my mind, and i experienced digestive pains as well as back pain.
content.summary: Strange happenings including possible loss of time ending in this sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
I had been working in sacramento. got a job in burne so my boyfriend , myself and his brother pack up on oct. 11, 1992 and headed for burne. we had agreed between us that we would alwayss keep each others car lights within seeing distance so we would not get seperated. when we headed for burne from redding we are going into the mountains. we agreed to stop at a little store that we knew stayed open really late to get something to drink. well, i was the middle car, my boyfriend was driving the uhual behind me and his brother in his car ahead of me. we were maybe one mile from the store and as i rounded one curve this red orange huge circle came right at me from about 200ft above me. i couldn't see the road. i thought i was goingto drive off the cliff on my right side. i slowed to a crawl but i didn't want stop because i was scared. i looked for the lights of the uhaul that was suppose to be behind me but they weren't there. i started crying. i was alone and could not see the road. then as quick as it came it was gone. i looked through my windows to see if i could see where it was. but i couldn't. i went on down to the store and the brother was drinking a soda leaning against his car. when i got out of the car he ask me what happened. he said he had been waiting for 15 min already. he ask where my boyfriend was and i said i don't know. it was another 15min before he showed up. now this is where it got weird. it wasn't until the next morning that i rememered what happened. i sat straight up in bed and my boyfriend ask me what was wrong and i ask him did anything unusual happen to him on the way to that store and he said no. he ask me why and i couldn't tell him because i was scared. i have lived with this fear since then. i'm not normally a scared person but when it comes to this, i start crying. i talked to my parent 6months later and was told to keep it too myself for the time being. this is the first time i have told anyone else. what happened to me those 15min.?
i have moved many times because i don't want them to find me. why do i think this way? i don't know because i don't know what really happened once i could not see the road. i seriously thought the thing was going to hit me. it came right at my front car window. i live by myself andevery time i hear thunder or see lightening i become uneasy and afraid. i don't know why.
content.summary: Heading to burne from redding i thought it was going to hit me and i lost 15minutes

content.detailedDescription: It was a hot summer night about 10pm.I was in my truck traveling east on the western hills viaduct towards metro cincinnati. i seen people stopping their cars hanging out their windows looking up. so i stopped, got out and looked up to see three massive ships. one over downtown cincinnati, one was over northern kentucky in bellevue area, the third was directly over me.Then i looked at the one over cincinnati, when suddenly a white beam emitted from a white central area of the ship struck the top of the carreuwe tower blasting off several floors of the tower.Then i felt the concusion from the blast hit me about a mile away.Then i looked straight up and seen the ship over me, the white area became blindingly bright in a flash.Then i awoke in a room about 20 ft square. it had shiny black floor, shiny dark blue walls.And the entire ceiling was lite up white with no discernable shapes of light bulbs or florescent tubes. there was four other people in the room, one  looked to be a homeless lady. i asked, where are we.The lady looked at me with a blank stare, but didn't say a word. so i asked are you all ok. still no answer.I said i am going to find out what's going on.I looked around found a door way with no door. it did have a shiny metal trim around the doorway. i could see the hallway through the way.As i walked through the doorway i blacked out.Then i woke up in my bed at home. i believe this event was a vision.
content.summary: A mile across, black shinny ext, blue light around edge

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside of work and saw a light out of the corner of my eye. i thought it was a star for a second, then all of a sudden it illuminated brighter as it was slowly moving south, and then it just blinked out. i watched for several minutes and it never reappeared. i never heard any kind of sound. i would say it was circular to oval in shape, and i've never seen anything like that before.
content.summary: Saw a ball of light.

content.detailedDescription:
-i was at school waiting for my mom to pick me up after basketball practice.
-when i first seen it, it was  very bright and moving fast.
-i thought it was a helicopter with bright lights
-while i was observing it, the object kept changing direction really fast and that's when i knew it wasn't a helicopter. it would drop and rise faster than a helicopter would and it didn't have any sound. it was far at first but it came closer and that's when i first started noticing its' maneuver like flight patters.
-i was in minor shock because i didn't believe what i was seeing. but was also very excited too.
-it started too fade away behind the tree
content.summary: Cell phone footage i caught after school

content.detailedDescription: First off i do not know if they are friendly or not some may be some not but they kinda work on a supernatural level what it is i dont exactly know the first thing is always the first so remember this... you will know it in your head first like a haarp signal when you hear a clicking sound like crickets or grasshoppers in your inner ear know they are very close. before contact they want to contact or abduct you  you will know this by not being able to sleep tossing and turning or also by suddenly feeling the urge to have to sleep deep. if so just stay up till the morning light. maybe i am an idiot for fearing them maybe not. the triangle is huge also orbs seem to be like drones checking perimiter ect. capacity to take down outdoor security camera
content.summary: How not to get abducted by someone who knows about the triangle + orbs

content.detailedDescription: On wed. 5/12/2014,at a few minutes before 10:00 a.M.,i was driving north on rt. 347 out of the city of maricopa, headed to the i-10. between approx. mm183 and mm184, i noticed a floating rectangle, with blurred edges, over the northern end of south mountain. it was moving south towards the towers. it looked unusual, so i pulled off to the brim of the road and used my binoculars to get a better look. sky was clear, air was hazy and it was breezy with gusts. the object was a grey/lead color and was floating and moving slowly, at what appeared, south along the rim of the mountain ridge. while i was trying to figure out what it may be, it began descend to the point where i thought it might crash into the south mountain towers. it appeared to have been slightly east of the towers but inside the park area. after the descent, it ascended slightly. at this point, i got a feel for the size of the object. it appeared to be as tall as the towers and it's length, end to end, expanded the 3/4 the visual width of the all the towers next to each other. my thoughts went from, blimp?, no, not round...Parachutist?...No, too big...Banner being pulled by an airplane? no, too big and no small plane pulling it...Ok it is unidentifiable at this point. my binoculars got me a little closer to the object but not as close as they needed to be. after the object reached the end of the s.M. south ridge, it began to move east through wild horse pass towards phoenix. it was getting further away but i could see where it was joined by a white/shiny small orb to the upper left corner of the object. the rectangle changed into a vertical cigar shape and both it and the orb disappeared. i got back in my car and continued to the i-10, then east towards the 17, then to greenway rd. i kept looking e/se to see if i could spot the objects again but there was nothing more. there may have been one other witness. when i was pulling my car back onto the 347, i noticed a car pulled off to the brim just in front of my car, that i had not noticed when i first stopped. there was no one standing outside the car and i'm not sure if there was an occupant in the car, as i was gaining freeway speed. i looked at my watch it was 10:05 and i believe my sighting lasted about 8 minutes.
content.summary: Lg. rectangle moving slowly over south mountain, joined by white/shining orb shape.

content.detailedDescription: i went outside to smoke before i went to bed around 9:15. tuesday night and all of a suddeni noticed a light at the horizon in the se coming towards me and realized it was hauling the mail if you know what i mean. at that point it had already traveled probably 60 miles and was right over me maybe a mile away from me and all of a sudden there was a pulse of light that came out and was very very bright. the whole time i'm standing there with my mouth open thinking wtf! i blinked and it just kept on going and was gone. with me still standing there saying wtf!!! i looked down at my cigarette and there was still three-forths of it left. so it went from one horizon because i seen it when it first came over the horizon, to the other horizon in less than 60 seconds. it really could have been about 30 seconds.  all i got to say is wtf!!
content.summary: Light caught my eye and noticed it was going very fast watched it from horizon to horizon in less than 60 seconds and when it was closest to me there was a pulse of light that came from the object.

content.detailedDescription:
she came to stop sign and  off to right  saw a bunch of bright lights and went toward them and saw the three ships with bright lights that had landed and went to take picture of three bright ships
she looked in her rear view mirror and saw two more coming toward her higher in the sky
she decided to leave and the next think she remembered is being in the mcdonald's drive thou feeling spooked and freaked out 
she thought she was taking  pictures but it was video instead  
she says she hears herself on the video just wanting to go home

the pictures show different orbs and shapes

she went home and the lights followed her home  and she saw orbs over her home with very bright lights and little orbs coming out from big orb

once inside her home she felt strange and started taking pictures inside her home and saw shapes and orbs in the pictures
content.summary: Saw three large bright ufo ships landed and went to take pictures

content.detailedDescription: My brother and my friend were walking to my friends house we stoped by the car dealership on the outskirts of town when suddenly i looked up what i saw i couldnt believe it was so weird i couldnt look away i said dude look what is that my friend and brother both looked as if they seen a ghost this big ship like thing hovered above us i was a lil freaked out told them we should leave they continued to look at it so it just slowly skimmed the sky when it got farther from us it then like the blink of an eye sped off like a rocket or something of that sort since then i have always been very interested in ufos and the extraterestrial i have much more since that inncident i like to go out in the country just to see if i can see anything please get back to me about my occurence
content.summary: My brother and friend walking late seen something i will never forget

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My daughter who is 29, was driving southbound on highway 77 through charlotte and i see a really bright line lights with flashing lights on either end, hanging in the sky. as the road curved around they were still there.  i grabbed my phone and took pick pictures and video. 
we heard no sound. the ufo was in air space twice the height of the tree tops not pulsating just bright.  we were still driving and they  were still there 
when we went under the street lights and all of a sudden a huge ball of light took up the entire windshield flew inside the car and was just gone.  
we were still driving and then saw a huge helicopter go over the car it had two  green domes on the bottom of helicopter and a blue light on top of the helicopter, thought it was police
the  white line of lights are still in the sky  
the lights are now behind us,  so we pull over to get a camera and turn around on the road to take pictures but couldn't see it   
 my daughter becomes nauseous and says she doesn't feel well 
when we turned around and my daughter was still nauseous and sick so we pulled over and turned around toward home and were going 90 miles an hour   
so to calm down we pulled off at denny's to talk about white light 1 hour later  we realized we were missing an hour   
after leaving denny's i am driving  and see the white lights again about where an airplane would be  and  think it followed them on highway 77
they pulled over to right of road to get video camera to take picture and to look at the lights which then came over the car 
looking out the back window  the lights are now low and the white lights are now red 
it turned toward us and looking up underneath it,  pieces came together to form a triangle,  and folded in on itself   
we started driving to get away from it and pulled over and now its a ball of light bright creamy while at tree level  hovering moving back and forth to stay in same spot 
we were terrified but not leaving just sat there on exit until another car came 
it seemed to wake them and then they left for home
mom driving 2 hours to home 
we pulled over to use restroom at gas station, but it was closed  
the the mom  saw a head and shoulders of person near her daughters window and it  shimmered  she saw a head, skinny neck and shoulders
it frightened her and they got back on the road and went home
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw bright white lights hanging in the sky that followed them

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway way last night taking to my son. he and i had been pointing out various starts. while looking at the various stars i noticed what appeared to be a shooting star. however: the shooting star stopped and hovered. i observed the star like object then move in a northern direction then stop and hover. it then moved higher into the air and hovered again. it then moved in a southeast diagonal pattern almost back to the point that i had original saw the object. when i first saw this i thought it might be a small person plane but have never seen a plane move the way this did. my house gets plenty of fly overs by small planes and also commercial planes. my son lives in rome and he also witnessed this via my pointing out where to look in the sky for the object. he told me at first he thought it was a star until it moved. i am truly not sure what we saw. i have been around a lot of airplanes and helicopters and have never seen anything that can move the way this object was moving. i did not get pictures or video as i was unprepared to see what ever it was that i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red white nad blue light in the western facing sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
One afternoon while in the backyard enjoying the breezy sunny weather, and playing with my dog i noticed a solid sphere or orb hovering over the ocean at a guesstimate of 500+ ft.  

it was a clear day with a few clouds, in late afternoon. the sun was toward the west and reflected off the orb's left/northwesterly side causing a whitish glare. 

the opposite south/easterly side, away from the sun, appeared to be dark grey and smooth - though i did not have binoculars to verify its surface.

i watched this thing hover for a good 20 to 40 seconds before i called my wife to come take a look at it.  when she came out of the house i asked her. "what do you think that is?"   a planet? she asked.  the moon?

it did look like a planet but was much too big to be a planet. it appeared to me to be maybe 15 to 25 feet in diameter but is very difficult to gauge in a blue sky.

as we were watching it, my dog attempted to give me her ball by poking it into my crotch which cause our attention to divert from the object for no more than 1 second.  when we looked back, it was gone.

nothing further was seen.
content.summary: Orb hovered in daylight reflecting sun for minutes before disappearing.
